name: Yet another color merging game
description:
Hello!

Welcome to yet another color merge game!

You'll see. The control are easy. You only need to move the mouse in the black rectangle (and sometime click the buttons at the bottom of the page).

I won't explain too much for now since I don't want to spoil the surprise. If there is something that you don't understand, leave a question in the comments section.

Have fun :)
